goal_statement: Develop the organizational skills and capabilities needed to effectively implement evolutionary development processes within our software development practice while building modular AI agent skills that automate the end-to-end approach from requirements analysis to project delivery.

success_criteria.criteria: Assessment of current team capabilities completed
Initial pilot implementation of evolutionary practices
Measurable improvement in development agility and responsiveness
Modular AI skills catalog with 14 functional skills implemented
Skills work seamlessly within VS Code/Claude Code environment
Change management system preserves requirement traceability

kpis.kpi: Development agility improvement: measurable increase in delivery speed and adaptability
Skill assessment completion rate: 100% of team capabilities assessed
Progress tracking accuracy: continuous monitoring and reporting of skill development
Requirements processing automation: all inputs and outputs in markdown format
Change management compliance: 100% of requirement changes tracked with traceability

constraints.constraint: Internal project with existing team resources
Must leverage current tooling and infrastructure
Timeline to be determined based on priority assessment
All inputs and outputs must be in markdown format for compatibility
Skills must work within existing VS Code project structure
Preserve original requirements documents intact as source of truth
Path patterns: From Tasks to Changes: ../artifacts/Changes/
Path patterns: From OrgModel to Changes: ../../projects/{project-name}/artifacts/Changes/

assumptions.assumption: Team members are available and willing to participate in skill development
Current VS Code/Claude Code infrastructure is stable and accessible
Markdown format is suitable for all skill inputs and outputs
Project-level context can be maintained through markdown artifacts
Stakeholders will follow change management process for requirement modifications
Existing processes can be enhanced without destructive modifications
Domain terminology and glossary will be sufficient for skill operation
PERT estimation methodology will provide accurate effort estimates

open_questions.question: What specific metrics will be used to measure development agility improvement?
How will skill assessment baselines be established for current team capabilities?
What is the optimal sequence for skill implementation and rollout?
How will conflicts between extracted domain concepts be resolved?
What happens when PERT estimates have high uncertainty (std_dev/expected > 0.3)?
How will the system handle requirements that don't map cleanly to the W5H framework?
What validation process will ensure generated diagrams are accurate and complete?
How will the change management system handle concurrent changes to the same requirement?
What training or onboarding will be needed for teams to effectively use the AI skills?
How will success be measured for the overall evolutionary development process implementation?

traceability.extraction_methodology: Rule-based patterns + explicit criteria extraction from source documents
